verses.verse: Again it happened on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3320>present<s%> themselves before <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H8432>among<s%> them to <S%H3320>present<s%> himself before <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H335>"Where<s%> have you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7854>from?<s%>" Satan <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> "From going back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and from walking up and down in <S%H1980>it.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> "Have <S%H7760>you<s%> <S%H3820>considered<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job?<s%> For there is none like him in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> a <S%H8535>blameless<s%> and an <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> one who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5493>turns<s%> away from <S%H7451>evil.<s%> He still <S%H2388>maintains<s%> his <S%H8538>integrity,<s%> although you <S%H5496>incited<s%> me against <S%H1104>him,<s%> to ruin him without <S%H2600>cause.<s%>"

<S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> <S%H5785>"Skin<s%> for <S%H5785>skin.<s%> <S%H376>Yes,<s%> all that a man has he will <S%H5414>give<s%> for his <S%H5315>life.<s%>

<S%H199>But<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>now,<s%> and touch his <S%H6106>bone<s%> and his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and he will <S%H1288>renounce<s%> you to your <S%H6440>face.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H3027>"Behold,<s%> he is in your hand. Only <S%H8104>spare<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>"

So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> with <S%H7451>painful<s%> <S%H7822>sores<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of his <S%H7272>foot<s%> to his <S%H6936>head.<s%>
He <S%H3947>took<s%> for himself a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> to <S%H1623>scrape<s%> himself <S%H3427>with,<s%> and he sat <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
Then his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2388>him,<s%> "Do you still maintain your <S%H8538>integrity?<s%> <S%H1288>Renounce<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

But he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1696>her,<s%> "You speak as <S%H259>one<s%> of the foolish <S%H5036>women<s%> would <S%H1696>speak.<s%> <S%H1571>What?<s%> Shall we <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> at the hand of <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall we not <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H7451>evil?<s%>" In all this <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2398>didn't<s%> sin with his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

Now when <S%H347>Job<s%>'s <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> that had <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H376>him,<s%> they each <S%H935>came<s%> from his own <S%H4725>place:<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite,<s%> and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite,<s%> and they made an <S%H3259>appointment<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5110>sympathize<s%> with him and to comfort <S%H5162>him.<s%>

When they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from a <S%H7350>distance,<s%> and <S%H5234>didn't<s%> recognize <S%H5375>him,<s%> they raised their <S%H6963>voices,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept;<s%> and they <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads<s%> toward the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>

So they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> with him on the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3915>nights,<s%> and none <S%H1696>spoke<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H7200>him,<s%> for they saw that his <S%H3511>grief<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%>
